info.title: Don and Hailee's Wedding
info.description: I got to be the best man at my friend's wedding. The wedding took place in Wisconsin. It was the biggest crowd I had delivered a speach to, but it wasn't that bad. The maid of honor was a man with whom I walked down the aisle, so, a little unconventional haha. Lots of great food, tons of drinks, and a pub crawl around Milwaukee made for a great night.
